name: An Unfinished Game...
description:
Created for the Classic Bitsy Game Jam

A while ago, I stumbled across one of my old projects I was working on back in my college years... A Cry of Fear mod/custom campaign called Purgatory, I remember all the hours and days I spent working on this little project before deciding to end it to focus on my studies.

Since then my life has changed considerablly so I thought I would pay tribute to it with a short experience of that very same unfinished map...

If you're interested in what that old project looked like then check out this old video I did for it.
